name: Mental
description: Mental endurance exercises to improve focus, resilience, and breath control.

workout_groups.name: Mental Endurance & Breath Control
workout_groups.description: Enhance endurance through breathing techniques and mental resilience training.

workouts.name: Box Breathing
workouts.description: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds, and hold again.

workouts.name: Controlled Breath Holds
workouts.description: Practice deep inhales followed by holding the breath for increasing durations.

workouts.name: Long-Duration Plank Meditation
workouts.description: Hold a plank position while focusing on deep breathing and mental endurance.

workouts.name: Cold Water Endurance
workouts.description: Take a cold shower or submerge hands/feet in cold water to build resilience.

workouts.name: Mindful Running Drill
workouts.description: Run in place or jog while focusing on breath control and endurance pacing.
